description: This file implements the advanced operation functions for the Sys Info Repository Object in a BroadWay Runtime environment. It includes functions to engage, cancel, acquire access, and release access to the repository, managing the object's active state and synchronization locks.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2Engage(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Activates the Sys Info Repository Object by setting its active flag to TRUE if not already active.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2Cancel(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Deactivates the Sys Info Repository Object by setting its active flag to FALSE if it is currently active.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2AcqAccess(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,BOOL bReadAccess)
methods.description: Acquires access to the repository, optionally acquiring a lock if access is for writing.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2RelAccess(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,BOOL bReadAccess)
methods.description: Releases access to the repository, optionally releasing a lock if access was for writing.
